lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, trying to help others that is.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyday is a new challenge which makes my job so rewarding

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: Many hands make light work.
lenders.occupational_info: I write the instructions that make the machines think.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish, he'll eat for a day.  Give him a leg up into his own business and he'll be set for life.

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.name: Paula

I like Kiva because it helps others improve the quality of thier lives and doesn't just give handouts.
lenders.occupational_info: Guiding and walking alongside people as they work to live life as healthfully and disease free as possible

lenders.name: Lender

lenders.occupational_info: When committees at my workplace have meetings, I keep a record of what was said and the outcomes of when votes are taken.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It's rewarding to know that even the small amounts of money that I can afford to loan can increase someone's quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to create Web pages. Now I am retired and do volunteer work to rehabilitate injured and orphaned wild animals to be released to the wild.

lenders.name: John

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: We love because first we were loved, we help because first we were helped

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: it is way better than charity, Kiva.org is transparent and definitively an organization you can trust. I am from Southamerica and I have seen poverty and the inmense enthusiasm of people up close...the biggest asset for entrepeneurship is courage... if they already have it, I don't mind putting the money in..
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to use their money wisely, if you can get a candy for 1 dolar, I can get you 12 candies for fifty cents...

lenders.name: Cat in the Hat
lenders.loan_because: Otherwise I would buy books.
lenders.occupational_info: I write, play music, and work when necessary. I know that not everyone has it that easy. May the universe smile down upon you and give you blessings.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.occupation: assistant in a cultural federal agency
lenders.loan_because: What goes around comes around. I have been blessed with generosity and kindness from many people and now I can enjoy to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office for several bosses. It is regular assistant work...........

lenders.name: Gary & Pam Fenner
lenders.loan_because: When my wife and I became aware of KIVA, we wanted to become a part of the global community that is extending financial resources to those in need.  Jesus directed us to take care of the poor and to be able to use some of the blessings he has given us to help others is quite an honor!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of my company's human resource needs (employee benefits, hiring, firing) in addition to being a part of the company's Senior Management team that is responsible for returning a profit to the company's owners.    My wife works in oral surgery as a Surgical Assistant.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be all they can be!  I hope in the future I can channel more dollars into Kiva and help even more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to keep any office as organized and efficient as it can possibly be.  Currently, I am the secretary in the Rehab dept of a local community hospital.  I am enjoying my interaction with the physical therapists, who are such a great bunch of people to work with, and the patients too.

lenders.name: Karen and Denny

lenders.occupational_info: Karen is an advertising sales executive.  Denny is in the insurance industry.

lenders.loan_because: People need

lenders.occupational_info: My work in cafe was attending and accommodate the people who want to log-in in internet.

lenders.occupational_info: South Florida's #1 Apartment Manager.

lenders.name: Chandini
lenders.loan_because: I like the satisfaction I derive from contributing positively to any venture
lenders.occupational_info: I'm making the world healthy and environmentally friendly.

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending provides a permanent and effective solution to poverty that builds developing economies from a "teach a man to fish" mentality. It enables motivated and industrious people to transcend their station, improve their standard of living, and build a better life for them selves and their children. Loans by their nature are sustainable, I can continue to help people again and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and a seeker of truth.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: People everywhere deserve the chance to achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently completing my bachelor's degree in business. I will be starting my MBA this coming fall.

lenders.name: Foghorn
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed with a fortunate life in which buff herrington watches over me and a bountiful feast awaits me each day.  I know that I may be small but my potential to contribute is limitless.  Each egg I lay is a new doorway to greater opportunity for those in need.  I fund only farmers and those who grow foods and treats I may one day eat.  I love to explore and perhaps I'll journey to where your farm is to sample your delicious crops.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a free spirit that frolicks freely about my backyard.  I have no boundaries and limits and explore life to its fullest.  I live to eat and eat to live - I've tasted the finest breads and the finest fruits and I will not cease till I've tried them all.

lenders.name: Kate
